text: China's Xi proposes 4 priorities for Ukraine "crisis" resolution, while Russia ramps up efforts to seize key town. Meanwhile, U.S. Congress dithers on approving crucial aid to Ukraine. It's time to put aside partisan bickering and support a nation fighting for its very survival. We can't let political correctness and bureaucracy hinder our responsibility to uphold freedom and democracy. #StandWithUkraine ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦
